styles.QLineEdit: color: #cdd6f4; background-color: #0a0a0f; border: 1px solid #3e3e42; padding: 6px 8px; border-radius: 5px;
styles.QGroupBox: QGroupBox { color: #cdd6f4; font-weight: bold; border: 1px solid #3e3e42; border-radius: 6px; padding-top: 10px; margin-top: 8px; background-color: #1a1a24; } QGroupBox::title { subcontrol-origin: margin; left: 12px; padding: 0 4px 0 4px; }
styles.QPushButton: QPushButton { background-color: #3b82f6; color: white; border: none; border-radius: 6px; padding: 8px 16px; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; } QPushButton:hover { background-color: #5294f7; } QPushButton:pressed { background-color: #2563eb; }
styles.QTableWidget: QTableWidget { gridline-color: #3e3e42; background-color: #0a0a0f; color: #cdd6f4; border: 1px solid #3e3e42; }
styles.QTableWidget::item: QTableWidget::item { padding: 5px; border: 1px solid #3e3e42; text-align: center; }
styles.QHeaderView::section: QHeaderView::section { background-color: #242430; color: #cdd6f4; padding: 6px; border: 1px solid #3e3e42; font-weight: bold; }
styles.QProgressBar: QProgressBar { border: 1px solid #3e3e42; border-radius: 4px; background-color: #1a1a24; text-align: center; color: #cdd6f4; font-weight: bold; }
styles.QScrollBar:vertical: QScrollBar:vertical { border: none; background: #1a1a24; width: 10px; } QScrollBar::handle:vertical { background: #242430; min-height: 20px; border-radius: 5px; } QScrollBar::add-line:vertical, QScrollBar::sub-line:vertical { height: 0px; } QScrollBar::handle:vertical:hover { background: #45475a; }
styles.QScrollBar:horizontal: QScrollBar:horizontal { border: none; background: #1a1a24; height: 10px; } QScrollBar::handle:horizontal { background: #242430; min-width: 20px; border-radius: 5px; } QScrollBar::add-line:horizontal, QScrollBar::sub-line:horizontal { width: 0px; } QScrollBar::handle:horizontal:hover { background: #45475a; }
styles.QComboBox: QComboBox { background-color: #1a1a24; color: #cdd6f4; border: 1px solid #3e3e42; border-radius: 5px; padding: 5px 8px; } QComboBox:hover { border: 1px solid #45475a; }
styles.QComboBox QAbstractItemView: QComboBox QAbstractItemView { background-color: #1a1a24; color: #cdd6f4; selection-background-color: #3b82f6; selection-color: white; border: 1px solid #3e3e42; }
styles.QSpinBox: QSpinBox { background-color: #1a1a24; color: #cdd6f4; border: 1px solid #3e3e42; border-radius: 5px; padding: 5px 8px; }
styles.QDoubleSpinBox: QDoubleSpinBox { background-color: #1a1a24; color: #cdd6f4; border: 1px solid #3e3e42; border-radius: 5px; padding: 5px 8px; }
styles.QCheckBox: QCheckBox { color: #cdd6f4; spacing: 8px; } QCheckBox::indicator { width: 18px; height: 18px; } QCheckBox::indicator:unchecked { background-color: #1a1a24; border: 1px solid #3e3e42; border-radius: 3px; } QCheckBox::indicator:checked { background-color: #f5c2e7; border: 1px solid #f5c2e7; border-radius: 3px; }
styles.QRadioButton: QRadioButton { color: #cdd6f4; spacing: 8px; } QRadioButton::indicator { width: 18px; height: 18px; } QRadioButton::indicator:checked { background-color: #f5c2e7; }
styles.QMenuBar: QMenuBar { background-color: #1a1a24; color: #cdd6f4; border-bottom: 1px solid #3e3e42; padding: 4px 8px; }
styles.QMenu: QMenu { background-color: #1a1a24; color: #cdd6f4; border: 1px solid #3e3e42; border-radius: 6px; padding: 4px 0px; }
styles.QTreeWidget: QTreeWidget { background-color: #0a0a0f; color: #cdd6f4; border: 1px solid #3e3e42; border-radius: 5px; }
styles.QListWidget: QListWidget { background-color: #0a0a0f; color: #cdd6f4; border: 1px solid #3e3e42; border-radius: 5px; }
styles.QTextEdit: QTextEdit { background-color: #0a0a0f; color: #cdd6f4; border: 1px solid #3e3e42; border-radius: 5px; padding: 6px 8px; }
styles.QPlainTextEdit: QPlainTextEdit { background-color: #0a0a0f; color: #cdd6f4; border: 1px solid #3e3e42; border-radius: 5px; padding: 6px 8px; }
styles.QTabBar::tab: QTabBar::tab { background-color: #1a1a24; color: #a6adc8; padding: 8px 16px; border: 1px solid #3e3e42; margin-right: 2px; border-top-left-radius: 6px; border-top-right-radius: 6px; } QTabBar::tab:selected { background-color: #3b82f6; color: white; border: none; }
styles.QStatusBar: QStatusBar { background-color: #1a1a24; color: #a6adc8; border-top: 1px solid #3e3e42; padding: 4px 8px; }
styles.QDockWidget::title: QDockWidget::title { background-color: #1a1a24; color: #cdd6f4; padding: 6px 8px; border: 1px solid #3e3e42; }
styles.QToolBar: QToolBar { background-color: #1a1a24; border-bottom: 1px solid #3e3e42; spacing: 4px; padding: 4px; }
styles.QToolButton: QToolButton { color: #cdd6f4; background-color: transparent; border: none; padding: 4px; border-radius: 4px; } QToolButton:hover { background-color: #242430; } QToolButton:pressed { background-color: #45475a; }
